data.comment: The match is underway at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Wessel Dammers is booked for the home team.
The home team replace Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist with Sam Schreck.
In the minute 74, Frank Wormuth (Almelo) is making a first substitution, with Teun Bijleveld replacing Delano Burgzorg.
The away team have replaced Silvester Van der Water with Ismail Azzaoui. This is the second substitution made today by Frank Wormuth.
Adrian Szoke is replacing Sinan Bakis for Almelo at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 77, Groningen make their second substitution with Kian Slor replacing Mo El Hankouri.
Remco Balk is on a sub for Jorgen Strand Larsen for Groningen.
Tomas Suslov is replacing Gabriel Gudmundsson for the home team.
In the minute 78, Goal! Adrian Szoke gives Almelo a 0-1 lead.
Danny Buijs is making the team's fifth substitution at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium with Thijs Dallinga replacing Wessel Dammers.
Frank Wormuth (Almelo) is making a fourth substitution, with Luca de la Torre replacing Rai Vloet.
That's full-time at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
